data.title: TV actress Pooja Sharma welcomes second child; Hubby shares FIRST PICS of newborn!
data.meta_description: Seen playing negative role in 'Diya Aur Baati Hum', actress Pooja Sharma give birth to her second daughter.
data.text:
It’s time to send congratulatory messages to TV actress Pooja Sharma as she has welcomed his second child. The TV actress, who made her small-screen debut with Star Plus show ‘Ruk Jaana Nahin’ opposite Aniruddh Dave, was expecting her second child with director-hubby Pushkar Pandit and she recently gave birth to her second daughter after Viyana.

The couple, who got married in the year 2016 and welcomed their first child, Viyana, in August 2017, took to their social media accoun ttoday (23rd June) & announced the birth of their little munchkin.

Pushkar Pandit, who is elated with the arrival of her second daughter, posted first pictures of newborn daughter on Instagram.

In the pictures, big sister Viyana is beaming with joy after seeing her newborn sister. In one of the pictures, Viyana can be seen adorably kissing the newborn baby.

Pushkar Pandit has captioned the post as, “My two little angels… Could not have asked for anything more… viyana giving a warm welcome to her little sister..#completefamily #proudfatheroftwo #littlangels… Thank you GOD… thnk you @realpooja”

Take a look at the pictures of Pooja & Pushkar’s newborn baby below:

https://www.instagram.com/p/BzCb4AXJ6Fp/Instagram

Pushkar’spost was then reposted by Pooja Sharma.

https://www.instagram.com/p/BzCdNJ1BWpn/Instagram

The couple is yet to announce the name of their second child who is looking super-adorable in the pictures.

On the career front, Pooja Sharma is also known for playingnegative roles in popular shows like ‘Diya Aur Baati Hum’ and ‘Tu Mera Hero’. Interestingly,Pooja’s hubby was the director of Pooja Sharma’s debut show ‘Ruk Jana Nahi’.

Heartiest congratulations to the couple!
